alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 17 at 9:06PM MDT until July 18 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 102 expected Monday. Low temperatures tonight may only drop to the low 70s. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
